translation:
During motion playback, the bone transformation information of the model can be baked and exported as motion data based on any transformation history.
There are no restrictions on the bones that can be baked.
For bone names related to physics within the model, prefixes will be added to the baked results and included in the display frames to make them readable in MMD.
Bake
&About the Tool
Add Set

You can additionally load multi-person motions or models for rigid bodies.
By adding sets, you can switch between the target models or motions to be baked.
Delete All Sets
Deletes all bake sets.
Load Set Configuration
Loads bake set configurations saved separately in JSON format.
Save Set Configuration

Saves the current bake set configuration as a JSON file.
You can load the saved JSON later to restore the settings.
Stop Baking
Stops both motion playback and baking simultaneously.
Play & Bake

Starts both motion playback and baking simultaneously.
The baked motion can be played in the 'Physics Baked Viewer'.
Gravity
Sets the downward gravity for physics simulation.

id: 焼き込み後モーション(Vmd)
translation: Baked Motion (VMD)

id: 焼き込み後モーション説明
translation: You can set the output destination for the baked motion.
Modified Model (PMX)

You can set the output destination for the modified model with adjusted bone names for baking.
The modified model includes bones with baking-specific prefixes added to the display frames.
Save Failed
Motion (VMD)
You can set the motion to be baked.
Model (PMX)
You can set the model to be baked.

id: ファイル選択ダイアログタイトル
translation: File Selection Dialog Title

id: ファイル選択ダイアログ選択エラー
translation: Failed to select a file in the file selection dialog.
Save Model

Saves the model adjusted for baking.
Bone names for baking will be prefixed to make the physics results readable in MMD.
Failed to Save Model
Save Motion
Saves the specified range of the selected baked history index as a VMD file.
Failed to Save Motion
Physics Settings Options

id: 物理設定オプション説明
translation:
You can configure options for physics baking.
These options can be changed and applied even during baking playback.
The physics settings changed here are reflected in the adjusted model and can be saved.
Output Start
You can set the starting frame for saving the baked results.
Output End
You can set the ending frame for saving the baked results.
Bake History

You can select a bake history recorded during bake playback.
History indices are automatically added during bake playback.
Changing the index will display the corresponding history in the 'Physics Baked Viewer'.
In that state, pressing the 'Save Motion' button will save the motion of the selected history.

id: 焼き込みセットの元モデルまたは出力モーションが設定されていません
translation: The original model or output motion for the bake set is not set.

id: 開始フレームより終了フレームが小さいか、負の値が設定されています
translation: The end frame is smaller than the start frame, or a negative value is set.
Mass Multiplier

Sets the multiplier for changing the mass of rigid bodies.
The larger the value, the heavier and less responsive the rigid bodies become.
Specifically, this multiplies the current mass of each rigid body by the specified factor.
It is applied only to the selected bone and its child bones in the bone tree view below.
Stiffness Multiplier

Sets the multiplier for changing joint stiffness.
The larger the value, the stiffer the joints become, making them less prone to deformation.
Specifically, this multiplies the current rotation limit of each joint by the specified factor.
It is applied only to the selected bone and its child bones in the bone tree view below.
Spring Multiplier

Sets the multiplier for changing spring strength.
The larger the value, the stronger the spring becomes, making deformation more difficult.
Specifically, this multiplies the current spring value of each joint by the specified factor.
It is applied only to the selected bone and its child bones in the bone tree view below.
%s (Mass: %.2f, Stiffness: %.2f, Spring: %.2f)
Apply Physics Settings

Applies the current physics setting options to the model in the currently selected bake set.
The modified physics settings are reflected in the adjusted model and can be saved.
These changes are also applied during bake playback.
Reset Physics Settings

Resets the current physics setting options and restores the original physics settings from the PMX model.
The restored settings are reflected in the adjusted model and can be saved.
This reset is also applied during bake playback.
Max Simulation Steps

Sets Bullet's MaxSubSteps.
Performs multiple simulations per frame to improve physics accuracy.
Larger values increase accuracy but also processing time.
Physics Simulation Frequency

Sets Bullet's FixedTimeStep.
Changes how often physics simulation is executed within a frame.
Higher values mean more frequent simulations and better accuracy, but also increased processing time.
IK Bake Target

Specifies whether IK bones in the output bone tree should be included in baking.
Specifically, IK bones, IK link bones, and IK target bones will be baked.
When enabled, the positions and rotations of IK bones will be included in the output motion.
Physics Bake Target

id: 物理焼き込み対象説明
translation:
Specifies whether physics bones in the output bone tree should be included in baking.
When enabled, the positions and rotations of physics bones will be included in the output motion.
